While I can't disclose all the details publicly, I assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me. I'm willing to offer you this product for a price of $2000000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to act quickly if you're interested.  
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $2,000,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $2,000,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer
